text: Henri Marie Edmond Valéry Giscard d'Estaing (born 17 October 1956) is a French businessman. He was the son of former French President Valéry Giscard d'Estaing.Laure Dumont, La confrérie des Giscard d'Estaing, L'Expansion, 01/02/2003 Giscard was born in Paris. Giscard d’Estaing joined the resort company Club Med in 1997 as chief operating officer in charge of finance, development and international relations. He became chief executive officer in 2001 and chairman in 2002.(http://corporate.clubmed/?p=1424 ) ==References== Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Valéry Giscard d'Estaing Category:Businesspeople from Paris
title: Henri Giscard d'Estaing
